title: Wollee the Worm
description: This is a Children's rhyming story book with great illustrations. Meet Wollee The Worm. Discover how this clever little worm brings food to the table. The worm serves a very good purpose. Beautiful illustrations, all in rhyme, little ones grow confident with words and sounds, whilst learning basic garden science. For children from 3 to 6 years old.
author: Niamh Clune
